title: Don't buy just because it is cheap.
body: The bass is not good enough & battery drains quickly in 2 hours if you play in full volume & even in medium volume it won't go beyond 4 hours. I bought in 2022 November and now 3 days back it is just dead not getting charged. Another issue is with Bluetooth connectivity 20 metres away it starts getting disconnected & if any obstacle comes it will start to buffer in connectivity. Basically a cheap product which is not value for money. You can rather buy 1200-1500 good boat or Philips speaker. Just because cheap it wont help. Note: this is not fake review u can connect with me at 865281792.
